XIII.i.5
.A.2.a
.
Service Requirements
Veterans and service members who served in the armed forces on or after September 16, 1940, and were discharged or released from military service under other-than-dishonorable conditions may be entitled to VR&E services.
Reference
: Â For information regarding eligibility for service members, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 5.A.2.d
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
